name: Baseball Combo
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a ballplayer? This expertly crafted finger game will bring you the cool feelings while flying your fingers!
Blow up those outfielders, be right on targets!
Come and download this free game, once download, free forever!

Game feature:
>Exciting game play, do not miss every baseball!
>Catch the combo chance, rush to high scores!

Tips:
>Don't catch those bombs, the baseballs only!
>The targets are moving, aim them accurately!

That's it. Go ahead and have fun!
